thread.section_title: Parts Town Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Parts Town | partstown.com | 4 of 128
thread.title: Erin P.
thread.title_full: Parts Town reviewed by Erin P.

author: Erin P.
title: Erin P.
text: I needed a part for my steamer ASAP, Parts Town had it. I was able to order it over night, unfortunately due to weather conditions FedEx couldn't get it to me next day, I let Parts Town know and even though it wasn't their fault they refunded my overnight shipping charges. They were very accommodating and I would recommend this business to anyone.
